prompt: Design a sleek dark-themed dashboard with a deep grey background and neon accent colors. Include a bottom navigation bar with three icons: home, stats, and profile, with the home icon selected. Display a greeting 'Hello, Alex!' at the top in bold white text. Below, arrange four metric cards in a single-column layout, each with a neon background (pink, cyan, lime, yellow), a numerical value, label, and trend icon. Add a 'Recent Activity' section below with a white header and three list items, each showing an icon, title, subtitle, and timestamp in a dark grey card with neon borders. Use tight spacing and sharp edges for a futuristic look.
